Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:

Nemesis Enforcer stepped out of his CR chamber (he really wasn't that 
damaged).  Recieving Zardus' com, he headed down.  Reaching Blue Reeker, he 
nodded.  "Follow me." he said, leading her to the living quarters.  Randomly 
picking one he pointed to a room on the left.  "That's yours.  But do NOT go 
snooping around, or I'll disembowle you personally!" he threatened heading 
off for Zardus.
